testName: Positive Test: Login with valid credentials and complete main flow

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Select 'Savings' as the account type
Select the valid source account '29217' from the dropdown
Click the Open new account button
Verify that a new savings account is created with a unique account number (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Store the new account number in a variable called 'AccountNumber'
Click on the new account number link
Verify that the account overview page is displayed and the new savings account with the initial balance of $90.00 is reflected (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the transaction history shows the opening deposit transfer (EXPECT: SUCCESS)

testName: Negative Test: Login with invalid credentials

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the Log In button
Verify that login fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Negative Test: Try to access protected pages without logging in

steps.step: Attempt to navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm' without logging in
Verify that access is denied and the user is redirected to the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Positive Test: Complete flow with valid source account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Select 'Savings' as the account type
Select the valid source account '29217' from the dropdown
Click the Open new account button
Verify that a new savings account is created with a unique account number (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Store the new account number in a variable called 'AccountNumber'
Click on the new account number link
Verify that the account overview page is displayed and the new savings account with the initial balance of $90.00 is reflected (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the transaction history shows the opening deposit transfer (EXPECT: SUCCESS)

testName: Negative Test: Try with invalid source account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Select 'Savings' as the account type
Select the invalid source account '12345' from the dropdown
Click the Open new account button
Verify that the new account is not created and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Edge Case: Try to open a new account with invalid credentials

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the Log In button
Verify that login fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Attempt to navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Verify that access is denied and the user is redirected to the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
